questions.name: Are you a pug?
questions.description: If your here to raid as part of the guild, press `no`

questions.name: Type your main's name with same symbols as in-game
questions.description: Make sure the name matches exactly, otherwise the bot cant find the char on warcraftlogs

questions.name: Type your alt's name with same symbols as in-game
questions.description: This is your alt 1, if you have multiple, please only type the most important one
